title: Allocate Inventory to a High-Priority Order
description: A high-priority sales order comes in, and an agent must manually allocate available inventory to it before it's released to the warehouse.

tasks.description: Find the high-priority order in the order management system.
Check current inventory levels for the items on the order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that there is enough stock available to fulfill the order.

tasks.description: Allocate the required quantity of inventory to the sales order, reserving it from the available pool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully allocates the stock, and the system shows it as reserved.
